meanings.definition: A form of yoga involving a set series of poses and breathing exercises.
meanings.sent1: Practicing ashtanga helps improve flexibility and strength.
meanings.sent2: Many people enjoy the discipline of ashtanga yoga.
meanings.sent3: The ashtanga class was so popular, it was packed like sardines.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to ashtanga was a shining beacon of commitment.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of ashtanga lies in its structured flow of movements.

meanings.definition: A system of yoga philosophy as outlined in the Yoga Sutras of Patanjali.
meanings.sent1: Studying ashtanga philosophy deepens one's understanding of yoga.
meanings.sent2: The ancient texts explain the principles of ashtanga clearly.
meanings.sent3: The ashtanga teachings resonated with her on a spiritual level.
meanings.sent4: In the vast ocean of yoga philosophy, ashtanga stands out like a lighthouse.
meanings.sent5: The wisdom of ashtanga philosophy guides practitioners on their journey.
